name: The Birthday (Waving Walrus Games)
description:
My own fan version of the popular game The Yawhg.

Play as a cow called Mookie and try and prepare for Prince Gareth's birthday.

Instructions

  • Press Enter to start. You may need to click on the game first.
  • Select options with the the arrow keys and use enter to select.
  • Go from place to place and choose activities to level up your skills in time to help with Prince Gareth's birthday.
  • If you do not have enough skill to complete the activity, you will fail.
